bike.description: 7005 triple gauge aluminum main tubes, 1.5" head tube, gusseted main frame, heavy-duty stays, rifled top tube & replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: RST DIRT RA, external preload & rebound adjustor, coil/MCU spring with hydraulic damping, magnesium lowers, 32mm steel stanchions, 130mm travel
Zero-Stack internal cup, threadless, 20mm shim stack, with 1.5" to 1-1/8" reducer
ALEX TD-25 eyeletted rims, Formula alloy 6-bolt disc hubs, 14g black stainless steel spokes
SRAM SX-4 rear mid-cage, Shimano Acera M360 34.9mm dual pull front
FSA AlphaDrive AM, 32/22 heat-treated cromoly rings, with alloy bash guard & chromoly pedal inserts, 170mm
Flats, full alloy with pedal spikes
Jamis DJ 6061 T-6 riser bar, 31.8 x 86mm rise x 640mm
Jamis DJ alloy 4-bolt bar clamp threadless, 30JAMIS_DEGREE rise x 50mm
Jamis OS alloy micro-adjust, 31.6 x 350mm with alloy QR clamp
WTB Speed V Sport SE with SL cover
